summary:
The Security Council,
Reaffirming previous resolutions on Côte d’Ivoire, particularly 1479 (2003), 1464 (2003) and 1498 (2003),
Adopted resolution 1514 (2003) on 13 November 2003,
 
1. Extended the mandate of MINUCI until 4 February 2004.
2. Requested the Secretary-General to report by 10 January 2004 on MINUCI’s efforts to facilitate peace and stability in Côte d’Ivoire.
3. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
